code: import React,{useContext,useState}from'react';import noteContext from"../Constaxt/notes/noteContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Addnote=props=>{const{showalert}=props;const context=useContext(noteContext);const{addNotes}=context;const[note,setnote]=useState({title:"",description:"",tag:"Default"});const handleAdd=e=>{e.preventDefault();addNotes(note.title,note.description,note.tag);showalert("Add Note SuccessFully ","success");setnote({title:"",description:"",tag:"Default"});};const onChange=e=>{setnote({...note,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"my-3 container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Add Notes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"  mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"title",className:"form-label",children:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",id:"title",name:"title",placeholder:"Enter Text ...",onChange:onChange,minLength:5,required:true,value:note.title})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:" mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"description",className:"form-label",children:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",id:"description",name:"description",onChange:onChange,minLength:5,required:true,value:note.description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:handleAdd,children:"Add Note"})]})});};export default Addnote;
